page.title: 20ABOUT OURSELVES
page.content: This survey has been done by Colwell T.V.E.I. group: names and topics. Jo Scott and Lisa Evans Local History Kerry Smith and Lorraine Fluck Read's Transport. Jo Read and Tracey Brown Salesian School. Angela Gapp interviewed Mrs Pickering Michelle Hounsell and Rebecca Price interviewed Cerie Smart and worked for a day at Longhope C of E school Jacki Clayton and Sinead Graham interviewed Mr and Mrs Hawker. Lianne Ryder and Louise Maybank were on holiday for the field work but helped with the computer input. Sarah Morton and Clair Ferris the 2 deputy head girls of Colwell School did the plum interview. Jean Duckworth took the photographs Project researched and organized by Brenda Morton.
